title: MurderBoardTest
body:
->Set clue as found
    ->Set Bullet Hole as found
        <<set $foundClues to true>>
        <<set $bulletholeFound to true>>
    ->Set Fingerprints as found
        <<set $foundClues to true>>
        <<set $fingerprintsFound to true>>
    ->Set Whiskey Glass as found
        <<set $foundClues to true>>
        <<set $whiskeyglassFound to true>>
    ->Set Syringe as found
        <<set $foundClues to true>>
        <<set $syringeFound to true>>
->Set as suspect
    ->Set Lola as suspect
        <<set $foundSuspects to true>>
        <<set $lolaIsSuspect to true>>
    ->Set Logan as suspect
        <<set $foundSuspects to true>>
        <<set $loganIsSuspect to true>>
    ->Set Nora as suspect
        <<set $foundSuspects to true>>
        <<set $noraIsSuspect to true>>
    ->Set Rachael as suspect
        <<set $foundSuspects to true>>
        <<set $rachaelIsSuspect to true>>
->Connect clue to suspect
    ->Set Whiskey Glass connects to Logan
        <<set $foundCluesConnectToSuspects to true>>
        <<set $whiskeyglassConnectsTologan to true>>
    ->Set FingerPrints connects to Logan
        <<set $foundCluesConnectToSuspects to true>>
        <<set $fingerprintsConnectsTologan to true>>
    ->Set BulletHole connects to Rachael
        <<set $foundCluesConnectToSuspects to true>>
        <<set $bulletholeConnectsTorachael to true>>
    ->Set Syringe connects to Nora
        <<set $foundCluesConnectToSuspects to true>>
        <<set $syringeConnectsTonora to true>>
->All the things
    <<set $foundClues to true>>
    <<set $bulletholeFound to true>>
    <<set $fingerprintsFound to true>>
    <<set $whiskeyglassFound to true>>
    <<set $syringeFound to true>>
    <<set $foundSuspects to true>>
    <<set $lolaIsSuspect to true>>
    <<set $loganIsSuspect to true>>
    <<set $noraIsSuspect to true>>
    <<set $rachaelIsSuspect to true>>
    <<set $foundCluesConnectToSuspects to true>>
    <<set $whiskeyglassConnectsTologan to true>>
    <<set $fingerprintsConnectsTologan to true>>
    <<set $bulletholeConnectsTorachael to true>>
    <<set $syringeConnectsTonora to true>>

title: MurderBoard.Add
body:
<<thinkingFont Dialogue>>
<<if $foundClues == true>>
[[Place discovered clues on the board|MurderBoard.AddClues]]
<<endif>>
<<if $foundSuspects == true>>
[[Place known suspects on the board|MurderBoard.AddSuspects]]
<<endif>>
<<if $foundClues == true and $foundSuspects == true>>
[[I should try to tie some of these clues to a suspect|MurderBoard.AddCluesToSuspects]]
<<endif>>
[[Leave the board|MurderBoard.Exit]]

title: MurderBoard.AddClues
body:
<<if $foundClues == true>>
<<if $bulletholeFound == true>>
I should add the bullet hole to the board.
<<addClue MurderBoard bullethole>>
<<endif>>
<<if $fingerprintsFound == true>>
I should add the fingerprints to the board.
<<addClue MurderBoard fingerprints>>
<<endif>>
<<if $whiskeyglassFound == true>>
I should add the whiskey glass to the board.
<<addClue MurderBoard whiskeyglass>>
<<endif>>
<<if $syringeFound == true>>
I should add the syringe to the board.
<<addClue MurderBoard syringe>>
<<endif>>
<<else>>
I haven't found any clues yet.
<<endif>>
[[MurderBoard.Add]]

title: MurderBoard.AddSuspects
body:
<<if $foundClues == true>>
<<if $lolaIsSuspect == true>>
I should add Lola as a suspect.
<<addSuspect MurderBoard lola>>
<<endif>>
<<if $noraIsSuspect == true>>
I should add Nora as a suspect.
<<addSuspect MurderBoard nora>>
<<endif>>
<<if $loganIsSuspect == true>>
I should add Logan as a suspect.
<<addSuspect MurderBoard logan>>
<<endif>>
<<if $rachaelIsSuspect == true>>
I should add Rachael as a suspect.
<<addSuspect MurderBoard rachael>>
<<endif>>
<<else>>
I haven't found any suspects yet.
<<endif>>
[[MurderBoard.Add]]

title: MurderBoard
body:
<<thinkingFont Dialogue>>
<<if $foundClues == true or $foundSuspects == true>>
    I should start mapping out the investigation.
    [[MurderBoard.Add]]
<<else>>
    Once I have some clues or suspects, I can map them out on the board here.
    [[MurderBoard.Exit]]
<<endif>>
<<endThinkingFont Dialogue>>

title: MurderBoard.AddCluesToSuspects
body:
<<if $foundCluesConnectToSuspects == true>>
<<if $whiskeyglassConnectsTologan == true>>
I can connect the Whiskey Glass to Logan
<<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard whiskeyglass logan>>
<<endif>>
<<if $fingerprintsConnectsTologan == true>>
I can connect the Fingerprints to Logan
<<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard fingerprints logan>>
<<endif>>
<<if $bulletholeConnectsTorachael == true>>
I can connect the Bullet Hole to Rachael
<<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard bullethole rachael>>
<<endif>>
<<if $syringeConnectsTonora == true>>
I can connect the Syringe to Nora
<<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard syringe nora>>
<<endif>>
<<else>>
I can't connect any of these clues to a suspect.
<<endif>>
[[MurderBoard.Add]]
